all_1st_derivs <- list() 
all_2nd_derivs <- list() 

for (i in seq_along(fd_groups)) { 
  
  mean_fd <- mean.fd(fd_groups[[i]]) 
  deriv_fd <- deriv.fd(mean_fd) 
  all_1st_derivs[[i]] <- eval.fd(Time, deriv_fd) 
  all_2nd_derivs[[i]] <- eval.fd(Time, deriv.fd(deriv_fd)) 
  
}
